column3: str

Keeping the Ways physically fit is now one of Managingway's many goals.<hex:02100103><hex:02100103>※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with Keepingway.
Deliver the requested item to the gaining Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale.
Report back to Managingway.
Speak with Keepingway.

<hex:0208F203CAE4E8050AFF6C><hex:020868E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:02E806020203><hex:FF45>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806020203> to the gaining Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale<hex:03><hex:FFF20355><hex:0208F2034FE4E8050BFF6C><hex:020868E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:02E806020203><hex:FF45>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806020203> to the gaining Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale<hex:03><hex:FFF202DA><hex:0208F202D4E4E8050CFF6C><hex:020868E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:02E806020203><hex:FF45>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806020203> to the gaining Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale<hex:03><hex:FFF2025F><hex:0208F20259E4E80509FF6C><hex:020868E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:02E806020203><hex:FF45>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806020203> to the gaining Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale<hex:03><hex:FFF201E4><hex:0208F201DEE4E8050DFF6C><hex:020868E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:02E806020203><hex:FF45>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806020203> to the gaining Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale<hex:03><hex:FFF20169><hex:0208F20163E4E8050EFF6C><hex:020868E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:02E806020203><hex:FF45>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806020203> to the gaining Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale<hex:03><hex:FFF0EF><hex:0208F0EAE4E8050FFF6C><hex:020868E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:02E806020203><hex:FF45>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806020203> to the gaining Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale<hex:03><hex:FF78><hex:020874E4E80510FF6C><hex:020868E3E802E803FF1B>Synthesize <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:02E806020203><hex:FF45>Deliver <hex:02310CFF05>Item<hex:03E806020203> to the gaining Loporrit in Greatest Endsvale<hex:03><hex:FF01><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03><hex:03>.
Report back to Managingway.
Prodigious hopping at the musicking station seems to have awakened a passion for physical fitness within some of our Ways.
Finding such hopping insufficient to reach their goals, they have requested items that may help enhance their athleticism.
Keepingway is gathering the necessary supplies for athletic equipment as we speak. Would you be willing to dash over and help?
Thank you for helping, <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>! I gathered everything I thought might help with, um, exercise.

For instance, this pole. If you attach heavy objects to either end, you could lift it over your head and...and people would think, “Wow, that's really something!” That sounds good, right? I'll have you make that.
For instance, this spring. It's sort of tough, so if you attached handles, you could pull on it and, um, become really tired so you can nap? That sounds good, right? I'll have you make that.

For instance, these bitter powders. I'm...not sure what's in them, but I think I heard that bitter things are good for you, so mixing these together should make something...good. Right? I'll have you do that.
Don't worry about running out of supplies─the doing supporter is well stocked.
Once you're finished, take it over to Greatest Endsvale. That's where those Ways have exercise. Or do exercise. I'm not really sure what they're doing, to be honest...
Thank you for requesting supplies. Please allow this supporter to scan your inventory. <blip> My! You already have many useful things. Please use your useful things before asking for more.

<huff> What? <huff> Can't you <huff> see I'm <huff> too busy to <huff> chat? <huff>
Mother's mercy! I-Is that what I think it is!?
With this, our dreams of toning our muscles to the density of iron carrots may yet be realized! I must go and tell the others!
<pant> <pant> Oh, it's <huff> you, <huff> <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>. <huff> Have you <huff> brought me <huff> something!? <huff>
Hydaelyn's holy hamper! It can't be!

With this, our dreams of transcending the limits of Loporrit-kind and attaining the divine perfection of those “Roegadyn” people may yet be realized!<hex:02093EE948FF01><hex:FF01><hex:FF01><hex:FF01><hex:FF2C> Just <hex:021A020203>look<hex:021A020103> at your sculpted body!<hex:FF01><hex:FF01><hex:FF01><hex:03> I must go and tell the others!
It seems you've made some energetic Ways very happy indeed! I thank you, <hex:022C0DFF07><hex:022903EB0203><hex:FF02> <hex:0203>. Something tells me we haven't heard the last of their demands.
Perhaps I too will consider stacking my body, as they say. ...Or was it “building”? Ahem!
Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
